code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import alertContext from'../ContextAPI/Alert/alertContext';var Alerts=function Alerts(){var context=useContext(alertContext);var alerts=context.alerts,remAlert=context.remAlert;return alerts.length>0&&alerts.map(function(alert){return React.createElement("div",{className:"alert alert-".concat(alert.type),key:alert.id},React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-info-circle"})," ",alert.msg,React.createElement("button",{onClick:remAlert,className:"btn btn-sm",style:{background:alert.type==='danger'?'#dc3545':'#28a745',marginLeft:'751px'}},React.createElement("i",{style:{color:'white'},className:"fas fa-times-circle"})));});};export default Alerts;
